funFacts.title: Al Bhed's Secret Language
funFacts.description: Al Bhed isn't a real language but a simple cipher. It swaps letters one-to-one, like A becoming Y. This makes it a fun, easy code to use among Final Fantasy fans, especially in games and forums.

funFacts.title: Unlocking Al Bhed Primers
funFacts.description: In Final Fantasy X, collecting all 26 Al Bhed Primers unlocks English translations of Al Bhed dialogues. It's a rewarding journey for players, enhancing their gaming experience by revealing hidden story elements.
